amendment.description: An amendment numbered 495 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement, establish, or create a NOAA Climate Service as described in the "Draft NOAA Climate Service Strategic Vision and Framework" published at 75 Feb. Reg. 57739.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall amendment (A138) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 187 (Roll no. 127).
